select product_order_detail_seq_product_order_detail_no.nextval from dual
insert into PRODUCT_ORDER_DETAIL (product_order_detail_no,product_order_no,product_no,product_order_detail_count,product_order_detail_price,product_order_detail_review_enabled) values (#{productOrderDetailNo},#{productOrderNo},#{productNo},#{productOrderDetailCount},#{productOrderDetailPrice},1)
mapper.select: select pod.product_no, p.product_name, 'http://localhost:8081/api/v1/image/product?name=' || pi.product_image_filename as product_image, pod.product_order_detail_no, pod.product_order_detail_review_enabled from PRODUCT_ORDER_DETAIL pod join product p on pod.product_no = p.product_no join product_image pi on pod.product_no = pi.product_no and pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_NO=1 where pod.product_order_detail_no=#{productOrderDetailNo}
